uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.controller
Class DataAccessUtilities

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.controller.DataAccessUtilities

public final class DataAccessUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

DataAccessUtilities provides methods for getting information out from the core objects.

Author:
rwang, ypriverol

getCvParam

public static java.util.List<CvParam> getCvParam(ParamGroup paramGroup,
                                                 java.lang.String cvLabel,
                                                 java.lang.String accession)
Get cv param by accession number and cv label. This method tries to find the CvParam for the given accession and cvLabel. IMPORTANT NOTE: As the cvLabel may not always be present, the method will assume a valid match if the accession alone matches.

ToDo: perhaps separate method without cvLabel would be better (then this one could fail if no cvLabel was found)

Parameters:
paramGroup - parameter group
cvLabel - cv label.
accession - cv accession.
Returns:
CvParam cv param.

getCvParam

public static java.util.List<CvParam> getCvParam(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String cvLabel,
                                                 java.lang.String accession,
                                                 java.lang.String value)
Create a List of Cv Params

Parameters:
value - Value of the CvParam
cvLabel - Label of the CvParam
accession - Accession of the CvParam
name - Name
Returns:
List
